mapper.update:
update tb_article
RoomId = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Metrology = #{metrology,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_article set RoomId = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Metrology = #{metrology,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
